ygData.subject: Re: Giant fire beetle?
ygData.msgSnippet: No, she s no harder. I killed her with a warrior at level 8 no problem, with no magical equipment and leather armor only. However, the eyes I have gotten off
ygData.messageBody:
No, she's no harder. I killed her with a warrior at level 8 no problem, with no magical equipment
and leather armor only.

However, the eyes I have gotten off her only give me one (1) charge of enchant silver. Just double
click on the eye and presto, you have an enchanted silver bar in it's place.

Good Luck,
Rosmorte

ken satchell \"flash-net & nikken distrubter\" wrote:

> From: "ken satchell \"flash-net & nikken distrubter\"" <ken4p@...>
>
> Does anyone know if they have made the queen klicknik harder? I know in beta
> i killed her with no problem at 8 or 9 I know then my weight was under and I
> had netted gloves on but nothing else special except onyx earrings and
> spiked shoulder pads.
> Ken
>
